description.lang: The Aeotec Smart Energy Switch is a low-cost Z-Wave appliance switch which can report immediate wattage energy usage or kWh energy usage over a period of time. It can also be controlled by other Z-Wave devices to turn on/off to save electricity when appropriate.With an unobtrusive small form factor, the Aeon Labs Smart Energy Switch will not block other nearby AC outlets. It is available in matte white.
